summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6052 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 7, Renton's Addition, being the Alley between 15th Avenue and 16th Avenue from East Olive Street to East Howell Street; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 82316, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
